titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the appointment of health care professionals to the positions of the Surgeon General of the Army, the Surgeon General of the Navy, and the Surgeon General of the Air Force.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S571)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Requires the appointment by the President of health-care professionals to the positions of Surgeon General of the Army, Surgeon General of the Navy, and Surgeon General of the Air Force.
